1.title: Meet the Morphy's
1.plot: This week on MDA, Meet Dan Morphy and his family business, Morphy Auctions. Also check out the 3 way collectible sale of some of the best toys and advertising memorabilia in the World! From robots to peanuts, the dollars keep rolling in.

2.title: Toys, Comics and Marvels
2.plot: It's a little kids paradise at the Morphy Auction house this week. Toys, comics and marvels all ready for play coming up on Million Dollar Auctions!

3.title: Incredible Dolls
3.plot: Whether they are porcelain or wood, or delicate or plain, these dolls are going to drive collectors wild! We are going to see incredible prices on dolls from ll over the World. You won't believe your eyes, so stay tuned for Million Dollar Auctions!

4.title: Fortune Telling Cats & Bar Room Extravaganza
4.plot: Barnyard baseball games and fortune telling mechanical cats keep the coins flowing today. Plus a bar-room extravaganza!

5.title: Barbershop Auction
5.plot: Sharpen your razor and oil up your comb! This week, Morphy's auction is bringing the great American Barbershop tradition to you, on Million Dollar Auctions!

7.title: Antique Advertising
7.plot: Nothing hits the spot like an ice cold Coca-Cola and with a massive array of antique advertising, these collectors are ready to show off just how much they love their favorite brands!

8.title: Antique Gun Auction Part 2
8.plot: We've got civil war rifles, derringers, colts, and more all on the auction block. It's time to lock and load right here on Million Dollar Auctions!

9.title: Robots, Comics, and Superheroes
9.plot: Robots, comics, and superheroes! The gang of 4 is selling at near record prices and stunning the collectors that chase them. It's only here on Million Dollar Auctions!

10.title: Road Trip to Texas
10.plot: Coin ops, juke boxes, plus a little road trip to Houston Texas. So buckle up that oversized belt bucklet and get ready for some high stakes auction action here on Million Dollar Auctions!

11.title: A Record Breaking Auction
11.plot: Coin ops, juke boxes, plus a little road trip to Houston Texas. So buckle up that oversized belt bucklet and get ready for some high stakes auction action here on Million Dollar Auctions!

12.title: Signs Toys and Advertising
12.plot: Signs, toys, and advertising, and you'll never guess what else we found! You can find it too, here on Million Dollar Auctions!

13.title: The Mechanical Bank Collection
13.plot:

locations: 2000 North Reading Road, Pennsylvania, USA::(Morphy Auctions)
imdb.plot outline: This fast-paced, thrilling auction series features one of America's premiere auction companies "Morphy Auctions" located near Adamstown, the antique capital of America. MDA sells the biggest and best million dollar collections while displaying self-made millionaires from around the world. Morhpy's is the market leader with record sales in the exclusive categories of dolls, coins, toys, advertising, art, pottery, real estate and more.
